overview.heading: Rochester Virtual Office
overview.body: Yearning for the advantages of a distinguished Rochester address without the constraints of a traditional office space? Opus VO is your solution. Position your business in the heart of Rochester’s dynamic business environment while managing your expenses wisely. Our modern conference rooms are at your disposal for crucial meetings and collaborative sessions.  When you choose Opus VO’s virtual workspace in Rochester, you’re not just securing a prestigious address. You also gain access to a professional live receptionist who seamlessly integrates with your team. They ensure every client interaction aligns with your unique brand identity, allowing us to handle routine administrative tasks while you focus on your core business objectives.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Rochester, New York even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Rochester. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within New York.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Rochester virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Rochester?
sections.body: Rochester is not just a picturesque city; it’s a thriving hub with opportunities spanning various sectors, including technology, healthcare, and education. Having a Rochester address provides you with access to valuable networking events and industry connections.  Opting for Opus VO for your virtual office in Rochester is more than a practical choice; it’s a strategic advantage. Are you ready to elevate your business presence? Explore our exceptional virtual office solutions today.  Grow your business at 3950 West Henrietta Road, Rochester, NY 14623.
